enWisdom: The thing with the worst outcome is deviation [from the right path]
The most destructive thing is persistent deviation

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْكَفَّ عِنْدَ حَيْرَةِ الضَّلَالِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ رُكُوبِ الْأَهْوَالِ
enWisdom: Verily restraint during the confusion of misguidance is better than embarking on terrors

Wisdom: ضَلَالُ الْعَقْلِ أَشَدُّ ضَلَّةٍ وَذِلَّةُ الْجَهْلِ أَعْظَمُ ذِلَّةٍ
enWisdom: Straying of the intellect distances one from right guidance and corrupts his Hereafter

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَهْدِي غَيْرَهُ مَنْ يُضِلُّ نَفْسَهُ
enWisdom: How can one who is himself astray guide others to the right?!

Wisdom: لَيْسَ فِي الْبَرْقِ اللَّامِعِ مُسْتَمْتَعٌ لِمَنْ يَخُوضُ الظُّلْمَةَ
enWisdom: There is no joy in a flash of lightening for one who is immersed in darkness

Wisdom: مَنْ زَاغَ سَاءَتْ عِنْدَهُ الْحَسَنَةُ وَحَسُنَتْ عِنْدَهُ السَّيِّئَةُ وَسَكَرَ سُكْرَ الضَّلَالَةِ
enWisdom: Whoever deviates from the truth, good becomes evil for him and evil becomes good, and he gets intoxicated with the intoxication of misguidance

Wisdom: وَيْلٌ لِمَنْ تَمَادَى فِي غَيِّهِ وَلَمْ يَفِئْ إِلَى الرُّشْدِ
enWisdom: Woe be to the one who persists in his deviation and does not return to the right path
No declaration can be made with inarticulateness
Where are the different paths taking you?

Wisdom: أَمْسِكْ عَنْ طَرِيقٍ إِذَا خِفْتَ ضَلَالَتَهُ
enWisdom: Hold back from [traversing] a path when you fear its deviation
